df-lp
blocks.content: Define a function on topologies whose value is the set of limit points of the subsets of the base set. See ~ lpval . (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-2007.)

blocks.name: df-perf
blocks.content: Define the class of all perfect spaces. A perfect space is one for which every point in the set is a limit point of the whole space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: lpfval
blocks.content: The limit point function on the subsets of a topology's base set. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm lpfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(clp, c0), cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(clp, c0), cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(clp, c0), cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))), universe))
  3syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))), universe), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cpw(c1), universe))
  topopn(c0, c1)
  pwexg(c1, c0)
  mptexg(s0, cpw(c1), universe, cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, ctop, cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))), universe, clp, cmpt(s0, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))), cpw(c1), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweqd(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  abbidv(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))
  eleq2d(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1d(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))), cfv(ccl, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccl)
  df-lp(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lpfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Top ‚Üí(limPt ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà P(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 | s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(s0 \ { s1 }))}))
  ‚ä£ c1 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà Top ‚Üí(limPt ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà P(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 | s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(s0 \ { s1 }))})), d(s1, c1))
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà Top, (limPt ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà P(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 | s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(s0 \ { s1 }))}), (s0 ‚àà P(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 | s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(s0 \ { s1 }))})‚àà ùïå)
  3syl(c0 ‚àà Top, (s0 ‚àà P(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 | s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(s0 \ { s1 }))})‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà c0, P(c1)‚àà ùïå)
  topopn(c0, c1)
  pwexg(c1, c0)
  mptexg(s0, P(c1), universe, { s1 | s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(s0 \ { s1 }))})
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, ctop, (s0 ‚àà P(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 | s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(s0 \ { s1 }))}), universe, clp, (s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ hs0)‚Ü¶ { s1 | s1 ‚àà((cls ` hs0)`(s0 \ { s1 }))}))
  mpteq12dv(s0, P(‚ãÉ hs0), { s1 | s1 ‚àà((cls ` hs0)`(s0 \ { s1 }))}, P(c1), { s1 | s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(s0 \ { s1 }))}, hs0 = c0)
  pweqd(‚ãÉ hs0, c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr(‚ãÉ hs0, c1, ‚ãÉ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  abbidv(s1, hs0 = c0, s1 ‚àà((cls ` hs0)`(s0 \ { s1 })), s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(s0 \ { s1 })))
  eleq2d(s1, ((cls ` hs0)`(s0 \ { s1 })), ((cls ` c0)`(s0 \ { s1 })), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d((cls ` hs0), (s0 \ { s1 }), (cls ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ccl)
  df-lp(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà P(c1)‚Ü¶ { s1 | s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(s0 \ { s1 }))}))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: lpval
blocks.content: The set of limit points of a subset of the base set of a topology. Alternate definition of limit point in [Munkres] p. 97. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm lpval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))))), c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))))), c1)))
  fveq1d(cfv(clp, c0), c1, cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  lpfval(hs0, s0, c0, c2)
  fvmptd3(hs0, cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))))), c1, cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))))), cpw(c2), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))))), universe, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))))))
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))))))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2d(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  difeq1(cv(hs0), c1, csn(cv(s0)))
  biimpar(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cpw(c2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c1, cpw(c2)), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c0))
  elpw2g(c2, c0, c1)
  ssexd(cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))))), c2, c0, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0))
  topopn(c0, c2)
  abssdv(s0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wss(cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), c2))
  ssdifss(c1, c2, csn(cv(s0)))
  sseld(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), c2, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), c2)))
  clsss3(c0, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lpval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí((limPt ` c0)` c1)= { s0 | s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { s0 }))})
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(((limPt ` c0)` c1), { s0 | s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { s0 }))}, ((hs0 ‚àà P(c2)‚Ü¶ { s0 | s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(hs0 \ { s0 }))})` c1), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚äÜ c2, ((limPt ` c0)` c1)=((hs0 ‚àà P(c2)‚Ü¶ { s0 | s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(hs0 \ { s0 }))})` c1))
  fveq1d((limPt ` c0), c1, (hs0 ‚àà P(c2)‚Ü¶ { s0 | s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(hs0 \ { s0 }))}), c0 ‚àà Top)
  lpfval(hs0, s0, c0, c2)
  fvmptd3(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà P(c2)‚Ü¶ { s0 | s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(hs0 \ { s0 }))}), c1, { s0 | s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { s0 }))}, P(c2), { s0 | s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(hs0 \ { s0 }))}, universe, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà P(c2)‚Ü¶ { s0 | s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(hs0 \ { s0 }))}))
  abbidv(s0, hs0 = c1, s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(hs0 \ { s0 })), s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { s0 })))
  eleq2d(s0, ((cls ` c0)`(hs0 \ { s0 })), ((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { s0 })), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2d((cls ` c0), (hs0 \ { s0 }), (c1 \ { s0 }), hs0 = c1)
  difeq1(hs0, c1, { s0 })
  biimpar(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚äÜ c2, c1 ‚àà P(c2))
  syl(c0 ‚àà Top, (c1 ‚àà P(c2)‚Üî c1 ‚äÜ c2), c2 ‚àà c0)
  elpw2g(c2, c0, c1)
  ssexd({ s0 | s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { s0 }))}, c2, c0, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚äÜ c2, c2 ‚àà c0)
  topopn(c0, c2)
  abssdv(s0, c2, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { s0 })))
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚äÜ c2, (s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { s0 }))‚Üí s0 ‚àà c2), (c1 \ { s0 })‚äÜ c2)
  ssdifss(c1, c2, { s0 })
  sseld(s0, ((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { s0 })), c2, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß(c1 \ { s0 })‚äÜ c2))
  clsss3(c0, (c1 \ { s0 }), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 | s0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { s0 }))})
  diff.hs0.c(P(c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚äÜ c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: islp
blocks.content: The predicate "the class ` P ` is a limit point of ` S ` ". (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm islp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(c3))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(c3)))), wcel(c3, cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))))))
  eleq2d(c3, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  lpval(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  elab3(hs0, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(c3)))))
  elex(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(c3))))
  eleq12d(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(c3))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2d(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), cdif(c1, csn(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  difeq2d(c1, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(c3)))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm islp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí(c3 ‚àà((limPt ` c0)` c1)‚Üî c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { c3 }))))
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ c0
} = {
  syl6bb((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), c3 ‚àà((limPt ` c0)` c1), c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { c3 })), c3 ‚àà { hs0 | hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { hs0 }))})
  eleq2d(c3, ((limPt ` c0)` c1), { hs0 | hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { hs0 }))}, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  lpval(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  elab3(hs0, c3, hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { hs0 })), c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { c3 })))
  elex(c3, ((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { c3 })))
  eleq12d(hs0, ((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { hs0 })), c3, ((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { c3 })), hs0 = c3)
  id(hs0 = c3)
  fveq2d((cls ` c0), (c1 \ { hs0 }), (c1 \ { c3 }), hs0 = c3)
  difeq2d(c1, { hs0 }, { c3 }, hs0 = c3)
  sneq(hs0, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c1 \ { c3 })))
}

blocks.name: lpsscls
blocks.content: The limit points of a subset are included in the subset's closure. (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm lpsscls(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  eqsstrd(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  lpval(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  abssdv(hs0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))))

blocks.name: maxlp
blocks.content: A point is a limit point of the whole space iff the singleton of the point is not open. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm maxlp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wn(wcel(csn(c1), c0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wn(wcel(csn(c1), c0))), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c2))))

blocks.name: clslp
blocks.content: The closure of a subset of a topological space is the subset together with its limit points. Theorem 6.6 of [Munkres] p. 97. (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2007.)

blocks.name: islpi
blocks.content: A point belonging to a set's closure but not the set itself is a limit point. (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2007.)

blocks.name: cldlp
blocks.content: A subset of a topological space is closed iff it contains all its limit points. Corollary 6.7 of [Munkres] p. 97. (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2007.)

thm isperf(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cperf), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cperf, ctop, wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs0))), cuni(cv(hs0))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(cfv(clp, cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs0))), cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq12d(cfv(clp, cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(clp, c0), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, clp)
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  df-perf(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1))
}

blocks.content: Definition of a perfect space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm isperf2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cperf), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cperf), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1)))
  isperf(c0, c1)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))), wss(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1), wss(c1, c1))
  ssid(c1)
  lpss(c0, c1, c1)
  baib(wss(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))
  eqss(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1)
}

blocks.name: isperf3
blocks.content: A perfect space is a topology which has no open singletons. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm isperf3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cperf), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(csn(cv(s0)), c0)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cperf), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(csn(cv(s0)), c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))))
  isperf2(c0, c1)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(csn(cv(s0)), c0))))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wral(s0, c1, wn(wcel(csn(cv(s0)), c0))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))))
  dfss3(s0, c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))
  ralbidva(s0, c1, wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wn(wcel(csn(cv(s0)), c0)))
  baibd(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wn(wcel(csn(cv(s0)), c0)))
  maxlp(c0, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfv(clp, c0), c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, clp, c0)
  diff.clp.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Perf ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ { s0 } ‚àà c0)))
  ‚ä£ c1 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ‚àà Perf, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ { s0 } ‚àà c0)), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ((limPt ` c0)` c1)))
  isperf2(c0, c1)
  pm5.32i(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚äÜ((limPt ` c0)` c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ { s0 } ‚àà c0))
  syl5bb(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚äÜ((limPt ` c0)` c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ { s0 } ‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà((limPt ` c0)` c1)))
  dfss3(s0, c1, ((limPt ` c0)` c1))
  ralbidva(s0, c1, c0 ‚àà Top, s0 ‚àà((limPt ` c0)` c1), ¬¨ { s0 } ‚àà c0)
  baibd(c0 ‚àà Top, s0 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà((limPt ` c0)` c1), ¬¨ { s0 } ‚àà c0)
  maxlp(c0, s0, c1)

blocks.name: perfi
blocks.content: Property of a perfect space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm perfi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(csn(c1), c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wcel(csn(c1), c0)), wral(hs0, c2, wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cperf), wral(hs0, c2, wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  isperf3(hs0, c0, c2)
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c1, wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)), wn(wcel(csn(c1), c0)))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(csn(c1), c0))
  eleq1d(csn(cv(hs0)), c0, csn(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(csn(c1), c0)))
}

thm perfi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí ¬¨ { c1 } ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ c0
} = {
  sylan(c0 ‚àà Perf, c1 ‚àà c2, ¬¨ { c1 } ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c0))
  simprbi(c0 ‚àà Perf, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c0), c0 ‚àà Top)
  isperf3(hs0, c0, c2)
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c1, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c0, ¬¨ { c1 } ‚àà c0)
  notbid(hs0 = c1, { hs0 } ‚àà c0, { c1 } ‚àà c0)
  eleq1d({ hs0 }, c0, { c1 }, hs0 = c1)
  sneq(hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(¬¨ { c1 } ‚àà c0)
}
